description:
Stackable contract chairs ideal for a range of applications. From budget stacking to chairs to high end options, all of our stackable chairs are quality tested and available in a wide variety of finishes and colours to meet the needs and challenges of the most demanding multi-use environments. We offer chairs with:
  • wooden frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • wooden frames with wooden seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with upholstered seat & backrests,
  • metal frames with polypropylene or wooden seat & backrests,
  • polypropylene chairs,
  • metal chairs and
  • office chairs.
All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
name: Indoor Stacking Chairs
